name: Neon Shooter Mayhem
description:
Neon Shooter Mayhem is a small top-down shooter game I made for brackeys game jam 2023.1 in 2 days!  In this top-down shooter you choose an ability and continue, the idea is that once you end the game and select another ability the gameplay experience will be different. There's currently only 2 abilities, so you might not notice much change in each beginning.

The game isn't long and is still in WIP (work in progress) and might be updated heavily after the game jam is over.

Note: You can return to the main menu from the scene by pressing ESC.
